hanzi-su-wiki:
侵

Значения

Посягательство; нарушать, вторгаться; нападать, поражать

Мнемоника

Сделка 受 с глазу на глаз. Присутствие на ней рабов 亻 не разрешалось.
purpleculture_pinyin:
qīn
to invade; to encroach; to infringe; to approach
вторгаться; посягать; нарушать; приближаться
rtega_mnemonic:

purpleculture_examples:
侵犯 [ qīn fàn ]: to infringe on; to encroach on; to violate; to assault
侵害 [ qīn hài ]: to encroach on; to infringe on
侵权 [ qīn quán ]: to infringe the rights of; to violate; infringement
入侵 [ rù qīn ]: to invade
侵蚀 [ qīn shí ]: to erode; to corrode

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T invades the French maid; driven wild by her little broom, dainty tiara and sinfully short skirt showing her knickers (crotch)!
heisig_constituent: encroach, person, French maid, tickle, broom, crown, crotch
heisig_story: Person . . . broom . . . crown . . . crotch. Gather the elements on the right into a composite image that can serve you in the next two frames.
koohiiStory1: The parson ENCROACHES on the French maid; driven wild by her little broom, dainty tiara and sinfully short skirt showing her knickers (crotch)!
koohiiStory2: Mr T. hits a condom salesman (broom + crown + crotch) over the head with a broom because the dude ENCROACHed Mr. T´s privates area during the sale.
jp_example_words:
侵す(おかす): to invade, to raid, to trespass, to violate, to intrude on
侵略(しんりゃく): aggression, invasion, raid
侵入(しんにゅう): penetration, invasion, raid, aggression, trespass
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There is a tiny leader on Wolverine’s forehead sitting on a stool and commanding his troops to invade Wolverine’s brain. These tiny soldiers are going to invade Wolverine’s body in an attempt to destroy him. The leader himself isn’t going to invade Wolverine’s brain, he’s just going to sit on the stool and supervise.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the little leader sitting on Wolverine’s forehead as he shouts “Invade! Invade invade! Invade his brain and destroy the Wolverine!”
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Soon they realize that they cannot invade Wolverine through his head so they travel down to his leg and try to enter through his shin (しん). The little soldiers take a big knife and slice open Wolverine’s shin in order to invade his body.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: See the little soldiers slicing open Wolverine’s shin as Wolverine grunts in pain. Getting your leg cut open is not a comfortable thing, even for someone as manly as Wolverine.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 浸 (ひたす、シン макать, окунать).
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 冖 (ва), 又 (опять), ヨ
Kanshudo_mnemonic: again (又) under the cover (冖) you give a yo (ヨ) as the man (亻) invades the house
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T invades the French maid; driven wild by her little broom, dainty tiara and sinfully short skirt showing her knickers (crotch)!
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from " again " from " broom " from " broom " from " broom " from " broom " from " bull " from count points (indicated by ◎), count points like water droplets, will use broom and water to wash the meaning of cattle (Tang Lan, Qiu Xigui). One said that the elephant was holding a broom to drive and beat a bull (Xu Zhongshu).

Oracle means invasion. "The earth invaded ten people in my field." Bronze inscriptions from " people " from " again " from " brooms " are written by Xiaozhuan. Bronze inscriptions were used as names, and Zhong Bo invaded the Ding: "Da (tai) silk (teacher) and Zhong Bai (Bo) invaded".

"Shuowen": "Gradually. From the person to the broom, if the broom is to advance. Also, the hand is also." Duan Yucai's note: "Guliang Zhuan said: "Bao the people, beat the cows and horses to invade.""
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts from " again " from " broom " from " broom " from " broom " from " broom " from " bull " from the count (indicated by ◎), count points like water droplets, will use broom and water to wash the meaning of cattle (Tang Lan, Qiu Xigui).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「又」從「帚」從「牛」從數點(以◎表示)，數點象水滴，會用帚和水刷洗牛之意(唐蘭、裘錫圭)。一說象手持帚驅趕、毆打牛之形(徐中舒)。

　　甲骨文表示侵伐。「土方侵我田十人」。金文從「人」從「又」從「帚」，為小篆所本。金文用作人名，鐘伯侵鼎：「大(太)帀(師)鐘白(伯)侵」。

　　《說文》：「漸進也。从人又持帚，若埽之進。又，手也。」段玉裁注：「《穀梁傳》曰：『苞人民，毆牛馬曰侵。』」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「又」從「帚」從「牛」從數點(以◎表示)，數點象水滴，會用帚和水刷洗牛之意(唐蘭、裘錫圭)。

侵字的基本解释

侵
qīn
（敌人）进入境内，（外来的或有害的事物）进入内部：侵害。侵吞。侵略。侵染。侵蚀。
渐近：侵晨。侵晓。侵早（破晓，天刚亮）。
古代称荒年：五谷不生，谓之大侵。

侵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīn］
［《廣韻》七林切，平侵，清。］
(1)越境进犯。
(2)特指不设钟鼓的进犯。
(3)侵占；夺取。
(4)欺凌；逼迫。
(5)指行事超出特定的范围、职权或限度。
(6)冒犯。
(7)背弃。
(8)指荒年。
(9)指荒歉。
(10)侵袭，谓一物进入他物中或他物上。
(11)侵蚀，逐渐地损坏。
(12)渐进。
(13)接近；临近。
(14)副词。渐渐，逐渐。
(15)姓。汉有侵恭。见《三辅决录》。
[②]［qǐn］
［《洪武正韻》七稔切，上寢］
短小丑陋。

侵字的英文翻译

◎ 侵
approaching, intrude into, invade

侵字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　侵； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页103第19
【唐韻】【正韻】七林切【集韻】【韻會】千尋切，?音駸。【說文】漸進也。　又朘削也。【春秋·胡傳】聲罪緻討曰伐，潛師掠境曰侵。又【周禮·大司馬】負固不服則侵之。　又侵尋。【史記·武帝紀】天子始巡郡縣，侵尋於泰山。【封禪書】作浸尋。【郊祀志】作寢尋。義同。　又歲凶。【穀梁傳·襄二十四年】五穀不登，謂之大侵。【韓詩外傳】一穀不升曰歉，二穀不升曰饑，三穀不升曰饉，四穀不升曰荒，五穀不升曰大侵。　又姓。【三輔決錄】有侵恭。　又【正韻】七稔切，音寢。貌不揚也。【前漢·田蚡傳】貌侵。【註】師古曰：短小曰侵。亦作寢。

侵字的源字形

侵字的起名意思

手拿扫帚，一步一步地扫地。后指武装侵略，即以武力对别国主权、领土、财物等进行侵犯、掠夺，镇压、奴役别国人民。

Invade
Basic explanation of words
Invade
qīn
(Enemy) enters the territory, (foreign or harmful things) enters the interior: infringement. Embezzle. aggression. Infestation. erosion.
Asymptotically: invasion of morning. Invade the dawn. Early invasion (breaking dawn, just dawn).
In ancient times, it was called a famine year: when the grains did not grow, it was called a great invasion.
Invade
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qīn］
["Guangyun" seven forest cuts, flat invasion, Qing. ]
(1) Cross-border invasion.
(2) Specifically refers to an offense without a bell and drum.
(3) Embezzlement; seizure.
(4) Bullying; persecution.
(5) Refers to acting beyond a specific scope, authority or limit.
(6) Offense.
(7) Betrayal.
(8) Refers to famine years.
(9) Refers to apologizing.
(10) Invasion means that one thing enters or onto other things.
(11) Erosion, gradually damage.
(12) Progressively.
(13) Approaching; approaching.
(14) Adverbs. Gradually, gradually.
(15) Last name. Han is aggressive. See "San Su Ju Lu".
[②]［qǐn］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Qi Min cut, go to bed]
Short clown ugly.
Invade
English translation of words
◎ invasion
approaching, intrude into, invade
Invade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　Invasion; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 103 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Qilin Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Qianxun Cut,? Yin Qiao. [Said Wen] Progressively.　It's cut again. [Chunqiu·Hu Chuan] The sound of crime is called punishment, and the submersible plundering is called invasion. Also 【Zhou Li·Da Sima】If you refuse to accept it, you will invade.　Invade and seek again. 【Historical Records·Wu Emperor Ji】The emperor first visited counties and counties and invaded Mount Tai. [Book of Feng Chan] for immersion. [Jiao Si Zhi] Make sleep search. The same meaning.　Years and fierce again. [Twenty-four years of Guliang Chuan·Xiang] The failure to climb the grains is called a great invasion. [Han Shiwai Biography] If one grain does not rise, it is apology, if two grains do not rise, it is hungry, three grains do not rise, it means famine, four grains do not rise, it means famine, and grains do not rise, it means great invasion.　Another last name. 【Sansuke Julu】There is intrusion.　 [Zheng Yun] Qi Min cut, sound sleep. It's not good looking. [Previous Han·Tian Fu Biography] Appearance invasion. [Note] Shigu said: Short-term invasion. Also used as bed.
Invade
Source glyph
Invade
Name meaning
Holding a broom in hand, sweep the floor step by step. Later refers to armed aggression, that is, the use of force to infringe and plunder other countries' sovereignty, territory, property, etc., to suppress and enslave the people of other countries.
侵
qin
侵
侵
本、义是“渐进”。《说文》:“侵,
渐进也。从人又持骨,若缔(扫)之
进,又,手也。”甲骨文的字形是一
優
只手拿着扫帝给牛扫土;金文是
一只手拿着扫帝给人扫身,表示
逐渐的意思。后多引申为“进攻”、
“侵犯”。
家
Вторгнуться
Вторгнуться
Вторгнуться
Оригинал и смысл «постепенны».
«Саид Вэнь»: «Вторжение, постепенное продвижение. От человека, держащего кость, если ди (взмах) продвигается вперед, и рука тоже». Шрифт надписи оракульной кости таков, что одна рука держит Императора Сау и взмахивает почва; надпись: «Держа императора Сау в одной руке и взмахивая телом», это означает «постепенно».
Позже это часто расширяется как «оскорбление» и «нарушение».
Дом
qīn, qǐn
I гл.
1) qīn захватывать, грабить; присваивать, узурпировать, овладевать; посягать, нападать; притеснять; вторгаться, интервенировать; интервенция
美帝侵朝 американские империалисты напали на Корею
2) qīn проникать, вторгаться
无使细菌侵入身体 не давайте микробам проникать в организм
3) qīn * налетать, совершать набег (налёт)
郑人闻之, 而侵宋 люди из княжества Чжэн узнали об этом и совершили набег на княжество Сун
4) qīn постепенно приближаться к..., всё более, постепенно, близко к...
侵晨 постепенно приближаться к рассвету
5) qǐn быть безобразным (отвратительным); безобразный, отвратительный (о внешности)
其貌侵 его внешний облик отвратителен
6) qǐn см. 寝 (останавливаться, прекращаться)
II сущ. qīn
неурожай, неурожайный год
大侵 большой недород, сильно неурожайный год
III qīn собств. и усл.
1) цинь (двенадцатая рифма тона 下平 в рифмовниках; двенадцатое число в телеграммах)
2) Цинь (фамилия)
Radicals: ｲ, ヨ, 冖, 又  (leader, wolverine, forehead, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
There is a tiny leader on Wolverine’s forehead sitting on a stool and commanding his troops to invade Wolverine’s brain. These tiny soldiers are going to invade Wolverine’s body in an attempt to destroy him. The leader himself isn’t going to invade Wolverine’s brain, he’s just going to sit on the stool and supervise.
Imagine the little leader sitting on Wolverine’s forehead as he shouts “Invade! Invade invade! Invade his brain and destroy the Wolverine!”
Reading Mnemonic
Soon they realize that they cannot invade Wolverine through his head so they travel down to his leg and try to enter through his shin (しん). The little soldiers take a big knife and slice open Wolverine’s shin in order to invade his body.
See the little soldiers slicing open Wolverine’s shin as Wolverine grunts in pain. Getting your leg cut open is not a comfortable thing, even for someone as manly as Wolverine.

化 (превращаться), 冖 (ва), 又 (опять), ヨ
Сравни: 浸 (ひたす、シン макать, окунать).
